title: ICT Chapter 3 ✪ Class : 01
description: A complete overview of Information and Communication Technology, its components, and its role in the modern world.
summary: This video covers the fundamental concepts of ICT, including hardware, software, networking, and data. It's perfect for beginners looking to understand the basics of the digital landscape and its impact on society.

title: ICT Chapter 3 ✪ Class : 02
description: Learn the basics of HTML to start building your very first websites from scratch.
summary: This crash course on HTML5 covers all the essential tags and structure needed to create web pages. Topics include headings, paragraphs, links, images, lists, tables, and forms.

title: ICT Chapter 3 ✪ Class : 03
description: Understand how computers connect and communicate with each other over networks.
summary: Explore the core concepts of computer networking, including IP addresses, DNS, TCP/IP protocols, routers, and switches. This lesson breaks down complex topics into easy-to-understand segments.

title: ICT Chapter 3 ✪ Class : 04
description: A beginner-friendly introduction to programming concepts using the Python language.
summary: Start your programming journey with Python. This video explains variables, data types, loops, conditional statements, and functions. No prior coding experience is required.

title: ICT Chapter 3 ✪ Class : 05
description: Learn what databases are, why they are important, and how they work.
summary: This video introduces relational databases, SQL (Structured Query Language), and the concept of tables, rows, and columns. Understand how data is stored, managed, and retrieved efficiently.
